title: Tertullian on Sex, Politics, Eschatology, Baptism and more
description:
This is our second video on Tertullian and the latest video in our Church Fathers dialogue series between Sam and Hank. In this episode we focus on other aspects of Tertullian's theology. We discuss his sexual ethics, political ethics, his views on baptism, eschatology and much more. 

Link to the first episode: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WGEhPCAi4oo

00:00:00 - Introduction to Tertullian
00:02:40 - Tertullian's Sexual Ethics
00:26:35 - Early Christian Purity Culture
00:35:40 - On circuses and gladiators
00:38:20 - On nonviolence, the military, and political participation
00:45:45 - Martyrdom 
00:49:25 - Eschatology and Premillennialism
00:56:45 - The afterlife and the intermediate state
01:05:40 - Prayers to Saints or lack thereof
01:07:25 - Views on Baptism
01:11:10 - Hermeneutics and Symbolism
01:13:00 - On Infant Baptism
01:18:10 - Sins and atonement
01:26:30 - Total Depravity and Original Sin
01:34:00 - Conclussion
